text:
もしありならこれからも会いやすくなりますし時間も調整しやすくなってくるのでお話進めていきませんか？ 💗
2024/10/13 23:01
ざっくりと説明するより事細かに決めていくことが成功の鍵だと聞きました😊
liberoさんはどっち派ですかね？ ♪
2024/10/13 23:34
まずは先に進めるようにしていきたい。 そしてあわよくば会って抱き合いたいとも思います。
これは実現可能ですかね？ 💕
2024/10/14 06:03
trans:
If it is possible, meeting more easily and adjusting our schedules will become smoother, so shall we move forward with our plans? 💗
13 October 2024 11:01 PM
I heard that planning things out in detail rather than explaining broadly is the key to success. 😊
Which side are you on, Mr./Ms. libero? ♪
13 October 2024 11:34 PM
First, I want to take the next step forward. And if possible, I would love for us to meet and embrace each other.
Do you think this can come true? 💕
14 October 2024 6:03 AM
